description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of the ... voyage and ... shipwreck of the U.S. steamer “Jeannette,” in the Polar seas, together with a full ... account of the death of Lieutenant De Long, ... and the rescue of Danenhower, Melville, and their heroic companions ... Compiled from authentic records [by H. L. Williams]" Contributor: DANENHOWER, John Wilson. Contributor: DE LONG, George Washington. Contributor: WILLIAMS, Henry Llewellyn. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10460.d.1." Page: 41 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1882 Publisher: A. T. B. De Witt Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001858108 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
